name: Happy!
description:
Hand decorated medium glass pipe with resin flowers, pearls and crystals.

We're loving the analogous and complementary colors! 

Approximate size: 12"

***All pipes are handmade, so each will not look EXACTLY the same, however the look will be very very similar. The glass used may vary but will be clear, plain and beaker in shape.***

All glass pipes are unique and made with love. An industrial strength adhesive and sealant that has a flexible hold, is water proof, nonflammable was used to bond the decorations.

For Tobacco Use Only
By purchasing a product from Fancy Barbarian, you agree to the following:
1) You are over the age of 18 years old
2) You intend to use the product for legal use only
3) You are abiding by the laws of your local state and city 


Please allow about 7 business days to create yours and 10-14 days for delivery.
I ship via USPS Priority Shipping with Tracking Info
If you have any further questions or custom requests, feel free to start a conversation and click Contact up top.

name: Keena
